Articles.Content:
In exactly one week, I will be embarking on a 24 hour gaming marathon to raise money for the children's miracle network. I will start the marathon with a good old fashioned tabletop RPG (Shadowrun to be exact) and then when the friends that just want to have fun but don't want to do the marathon get tired I will be moving with a friend or two over to KSP for the remainder of the time. We will not be playing MP as there are too many issues associated with that, but we will be in the same room and will set up a scoring system so we can keep it competitive, we will be using mods, but to keep it fair we will be using the same ones. I will be streaming the entire time (RPG and KSP), my twitch profile name is the same as my name here on these forums "jab136". If you would like to donate, here is a link to my donation page. And remember that it is for the kids and all donations are tax deductible.

http://www.extra-life.org/index.cfm?fuseaction=donordrive.participant&participantID=90380

Moved to Mission Control since it's about a streaming event.

And good luck!

sorry about that, thanks

Not a problem. Just doin' mah job.

Suggest you update this thread with more details closer to the time. The forum rules might say "no bumping", but that doesn't mean you can't put relevant content in later.

Speaking of which, I'll shut up now and hopefully let the flood of interested people reply. Which I'm sure they will. Yep. Can just see it coming. In 5, 4, 3...

Well, maybe.
hey everyone, just a reminder this stream will be starting at 9 am EST tomorrow morning and will be running until 9 am EST on sunday.

only slightly more than 30 minutes till the madness begins. you should be able to donate all day today, and probably for a couple weeks after. Also, slight update, my friends decided they were too busy with schoolwork to help me out, so I will be playing KSP all 24 hours, and will be playing by myself.

Edited October 25, 2014 by jab136

Ok, so after Jeb was killed either by the kraken, or by crashing into minmus on my first mission, bill was killed by the kraken when lifting off on my second mission, and bob landed on his side at the mun and then proceeded to drive himself into the surface when trying to take off again. I am really thinking that KSP doesnt' like me very much today, and that I should play some other game for the rest of the duration. I will check back in a few hours and maybe re-start the stream, but right now ksp is being annoying, and not very fun, so I will take a break to play something else. If I can get some donations for the kids I will start streaming again, but right now it isn't worth the frustration.

I am currently playing Destiny on the 360, if you want to join, my gamertag is jab136

Edited October 25, 2014 by jab136

tried playing ksp again, haven't played in a while, just didn't catch me, and I am also feeling slightly sick (probably all the soda, that I am not used to drinking) gonna lie down for a bit and continue doing Extra life in my own way (watch roosterteeth's stream, and maybe play some games on the 360)
